item.title: Dynamic Neural Memory for In-Context Learning: SSMs or Transformers?
item.description: Can we combine features of both SSMs and Transformers to build a graph-like hierarchical memory mechanism with sublinear growth? Each node represents a concept, and edges connect concepts similar to an associative memory. The graph is traversed with attention mechanism to retrieve or add information.

item.title: Probabilistic Homotopy Optimization for Dynamic Motion Planning
item.description: Inspired by Curriculum Learning and Probabilistic Roadmaps, PHO traverses a multidimensional homotopy space and discovers highly dynamic trajectories.

item.title: Shape Generation with SO3-Equivariant Auto-Encoders
item.description: Designed an SO(3) equivariant autoencoder using spherical harmonics and a latent space traversal that separates rotation from deformation.

item.title: Decision State Space Model
item.description: Reimplemented Decision Transformer replacing transformer with S4 model and demonstrated improved performance in credit assignment tasks.

item.title: Face Explore
item.description: Created a face search engine that uses a custom clustering method on ResNet vector embeddings (unsupervised). The UI is a scalable website.

item.title: Formal Complexity Verification
item.description: Formulated time complexity verification of a program as synthesizing a fix-point function. The demo uses a custom language with Python syntax.

item.title: Scripty
item.description: Educational tool to track student performance on projects, providing live feedback and tips, and automating infrastructure setup for instructors. Built with Python, DSPy, Kubernetes, and React; won Warp and Orbstack challenge prizes.

item.title: Sharif AI Challenge
item.description: Developed AI agents for a multi-agent game, achieving 4th place in the competition. Implemented Huffman coding for cost-effective communication and utilized the A* algorithm for shortest pathfinding on a partially explored map.
